sentences: Their show “The Operating Room” was broadcast on Monday nights from Adelphi University on the same station which featured the Spectrum City DJs (Chuck D and Flavor Flav) who later went on to form Public Enemy.
The members were Doctor Dré, T-Money, Rapper G, Easy G. By 1986, the group began calling themselves Original Concept and had released their first record, "Knowledge Me" in February of that year.
Doctor Dre, T-Money and Rapper G wrote the song "Proud to be Black", on the 1986 album, Raising Hell for Run-DMC.
